entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is a person who is in charge of the team. He is mentioned as having no criticisms to make, which is a first according to George Weasley.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is a person who points out that Wood has no criticisms to make.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is part of the team. He is mentioned as having a dementor problem and wishing his Patronus were stronger.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is a person who confidently says that Dumbledore would go ballistic if the dementors came back.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who is mentioned as someone who would be upset if the dementors came back.

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: Madam Hooch is a person who has fallen asleep in her seat.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who wants to ride the Firebolt.

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: The Firebolt is an object that Ron wants to ride.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are things that Harry has a problem with and Fred mentions would make Dumbledore go ballistic if they came back.

relationships.description: Wood is commented on by George Weasley.
Fred mentions that Dumbledore would be concerned if the dementors came back.
Ron wants to use the Firebolt.
Harry ignores Madam Hooch who has fallen asleep in her seat.
